flags.gate_pattern: Shift change leaves ~30-second gap; two-guard patrol loop every few minutes
flags.postern_window: Side postern unlatched briefly when a runner passes from inner yard
flags.postern_entry: Slipped in as runner unlatched; one guard glanced, mild suspicion
flags.cover: Crate stack just inside postern; muffled footsteps nearby
flags.mission_objective: Plant a forged gate roster page in the quartermaster's ledger so courier Merran can exit at midnight on a bogus lantern-check detail.
flags.mission_contact: Handler Sable prepped the forged roster page; rendezvous at the Black Gull tavern after the job.
flags.mission_stakes: If the page isn't planted tonight, Merran is held at dawn and Sable burns Shriveai's alias; reward is 50 gp and a safehouse marker.
flags.position_detail: Behind crates just inside the postern; ledger room is along the interior hall ahead of the patrol route.

main.title: Swap the Gate Ledger
main.objective: Insert Sable's forged roster page so courier Merran can exit at midnight on a bogus lantern-check detail.
main.reward: 50 gp and a Black Gull safehouse marker
